name: The somewhat noteworthy game featuring Virtual guy and THE SINNER in all out combat for the sensation prototype game
name_original: The somewhat noteworthy game featuring Virtual guy and THE SINNER in all out combat for the sensation prototype game
description:
This game was made with the prompt of sensation. I decided I wanted to create a sense of being overwhelmed with the player, so I made it a horde shooter, with endless amounts of enemies that the player needs to fight back.

Assets used:

gdevelop. (n.d.). Sci Fi Lab [Asset Pack Sci Fi Lab]. Retrieved March ‎30, 2023, from https://gdevelop.io/asset-store/free/sci-fi-lab-sci-fi-lab 

‌gdevelop. (n.d.). Void Collection [Asset Pack Void Collection]. Retrieved March ‎30, 2023, from https://gdevelop.io/asset-store/free/void-collection-void-collection 

‌gdevelop. (n.d.). Space Shooter [Asset Pack Space Shooter]. Retrieved March ‎30, 2023, from https://gdevelop.io/asset-store/free/space-shooter-space-shooter

‌gdevelop. (n.d.). Pixel Adventure [Asset Pack Pixel Adventure]. Retrieved March 21, 2023, from https://gdevelop.io/asset-store/free/pixel-adventure-pixel-adventure-pack 

Music:

Komiku. (2020, October 10), Road 4 Fight  ‎Thursday, ‎March ‎30, ‎2023, https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Komiku/Helice_Awesome_Dance_Adventure_/road-4-fight/
